attributes.action: increase the value of the healthy start vouchers and to allow a voucher to be used as whole payment for a tin of formula milk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The healthy start vouchers are a great idea but the cost of fresh fruit and veg and formula milk are far exceeding the value of a voucher. If the government want to tackle childhood obesity, they should help families supply fresh food on a daily basis by increasing their accessibilty to healthy food stuffs.
